flavorText:
"Your enemies will pound upon the door of your defenses, but only you shall have the key, and it is the key of life."
—*Song of All*, canto 873

foreignData.name: Verteidigungsformation
foreignData.text: Anstatt des angreifenden Spielers bestimmst Du, wie Kreaturen, die Dich angreifen, ihren Kampfschaden austeilen.

name: Defensive Formation
originalText: Instead of the attacking player, you choose how creatures attacking you deal combat damage.

rulings.text: Damage assignment choices from Trample and other things which allow alternative damage assignments for attacking creatures are all made by you.
With the exception of ignoring the damage assignment order, you follow all the normal rules for damage assignment.

text: Rather than the attacking player, you assign the combat damage of each creature attacking you. You can divide that creature's combat damage as you choose among any of the creatures blocking it.
